{{Actor| | type = Light source | name = Silver tech lamp | class = TechLampSilver | game = Strife | doomednum = 196 | convid = 280 }}[[Classes]]: TechLampSilver
{{desc}}In Strife1.wad, the sprite is actually named TLMPA0 and is [[Sprite renaming|renamed at load-time]] by ZDoom. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR TechLampSilver { {{Property|Radius}} 11 {{Property|Height}} 64 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: TECH A -1 // No, it's not bright Stop } }
